name: Bunka no Kenkyu - Revival of Queen Leyak -
description: Bunka no KenkyÅ« - Revival of Queen Leyak - is a thriller visual novel set in Bali, an exotic island where technology, tradition, and supernatural horrors all lurk under the guise of a modern paradise. Solve a mystery steeped in Indonesian folklore and romance your companions along the way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Newer Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics Chipset Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: You could probably run this thing on a toaster (not legally binding here guys)
